Recommended architecture: 64 bits

DOWNLOADS
Lineage 2 Interlude Client (clean) with system patched (clean, compatible with Windows 10): http://www.mediafire.com/file/th5d77tw319ioyt/lin2_il_w10.rar/file
File Edit: https://github.com/L2Miko/L2FileEdit/archive/master.zip
